Articles.Content: I'm new to KSP (Starting in 2). I did the tutorials for building and specifically for this issues the subassembly tutorial. I have a successful spacecraft that will orbit so naturally I want to build a space station. So I built a cargo "pod" to attach to my spacecraft (it's just cargo space with a small fuel tank, engine, and 2 SRBs.) When I attempt to attach it to my main spacecraft the only snap it has is in the cargobay. So now my Spacecraft is stored inside the cargo area. How do I attach the cargocraft to the outside of my spacecraft?

Some pictures would be nice to see the problem. Normally there should be no problems with adding to the stack, although you may want to change the root/anchor part on the vessel you're trying to attach so that you're holding it by the part that connects to the other subassembly.
